components/products/carousel:
{{lang 'ap-base-1.new-products.new' }} {{lang 'ap-base-1.new-products.description' }}

{{#each products}}
{{> components/products/card theme_settings=../theme_settings customer=../customer show_rating=../settings.show_product_rating show_compare=../settings setting_show = ../settings}}
{{/each}}
components/products/card:
{{name}}

{{#if show_rating}}

{{> components/products/ratings rating=rating}}

{{/if}}
{{#or customer (if theme_settings.restrict_to_login '!==' true)}} {{> components/products/price price=price customer=customer}} {{else}} {{> components/common/login-for-pricing}} {{/or}}
{{#if theme_settings.show_product_card_countdown}}
{{#each custom_fields}} {{#if name '===' 'countdown'}} {{{value}}} {{/if}} {{/each}}
{{/if}} {{#if summary}}

{{{summary}}}

{{/if}}
